price: Inni samiileefii keessattiifi dachii keessattis gabbaramaadha. Iccitii keessaniifi ifa bahaa keessanis ni beeka. Waan isin hojjattanis ni beeka.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَفِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَعۡلَمُ سِرَّكُمۡ وَجَهۡرَكُمۡ وَيَعۡلَمُ مَا تَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wafī al-arḍi yaʿlamu sirrakum wajahrakum wayaʿlamu mā taksibūna
